boardgame.name: Sub Terra
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A 1-6 player cooperative game of terrifying cave escape. Players take the role of amateur cavers attempting to escape an unexplored network of subterranean tunnels, before the lights flicker out or the darker things beneath the Earth catch up to them..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Sub Terra players spend their turn exploring and revealing the tunnel system around them, attempting to survive the various perils of the cave, from floods and cave ins to gas leaks and scree. Players each have a role which gives them specialist abilities, such as an Engineer with dynamite to blast a new route or a Scout to find a route more easily._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New tiles are placed from a randomised stack of cave features, which determines whether you'll be hit with a dead end or a range of new options._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of each turn, players face the reality of their situation, with a hazard card drawn to determine what danger causes them damage or cuts off their way out of the horror below._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;These cards are finite, and when they run out, your torches flicker and the air feels tight, and your chance of survival diminishes quickly._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Makeweight in a trade, played once by me and its not my sort of game. Good to very good condition. Will ship to UK only. Shipping via Myhermes direct to your door including tracking, £5. Payment via paypal. Will combine shipping with other items for lower cost where possible.

This listing is for the Deluxe Caver Character Miniatures Expansion set only - base game not included. Currently, this miniature set is listed for £15.00 (~ $22 USD) on the ITB website. I purchased the Deluxe Version of the game and have not used the miniatures at all. These minis have never been removed from the original plastic packaging, only taken out of the Deluxe Edition box. My wife and I enjoy the game using the meeples that came with the core edition and expansions. For shipping purposes, my zip code is 99645. I will ship via USPS or UPS Ground. Note: the items will just fit into a small flat rate shipping box (USPS) or a medium rate shipping box with extra room for bubble wrap. Items can also be shipped world wide, although the cost of shipping will be higher. If interested, I can also send the Graphic Novel (listed for £20 @ ITB store) and Development Diary for an additional $12.50 USD. Thanks for checking out these items, and I hope you find what you are looking for. Please send me a message if you have any additional questions. Sincerely, Bryan McInnis

This listing is for a like new copy of the base game of Subterra. The game is in like new condition with no damage to any of the components whatsoever. All the cards in the game are sleeved with FFG card sleeves. I will only accept payment via Paypal and will only ship to the CONUS via UPS. Thanks!

NOT THE GAME but the Kickstarter Backer Kit which includes: - Stickers for Horror/Leaper tokens - Corner tile to replace the additional ledge tile in the core game - Story cards for the expansion characters - A new set of promo start and exit tiles - Graphic Novel Art Promo Out of Time Card - Exclusive Sub Terra ‘Specialist Caver’ foiled sticker - Foil Scoring stickers (Platinum, Gold, Silver, Bronze, Defeat) - Foil Erebus Industrial Sticker - Graphic Novel art poster with all corrected backer names - Punch board components to securely construct the tile holder - Reprint of Extraction rulesheet with updated scoring system AGAIN: THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE THE GAME.
Brand new, still in shrink. See picture. Includes: Core game Annihilation Extraction Investigation Player matched Dice
